markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Choker-Arm Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1958)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=116" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your limbs become extremely limber, letting you stretch and twist to extreme degrees at the cost of fine motor skills. 

**Benefit** You gain the listed item bonus to [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79), [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=31), and [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29), and you increase your reach by the listed amount. 

**Drawback** You take a –1 penalty to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) checks, and attack rolls, and a –1 penalty per damage die to all weapon and [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Choker-Arm Mutagen (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +1, your [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) increases by 5 feet, and the duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Choker-Arm Mutagen (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2, your reach increases by 5 feet, and the duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Choker-Arm Mutagen (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3, your reach increases by 10 feet, and the duration is 1 hour.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Choker-Arm Mutagen (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +4, your reach increases by 15 feet, and the duration is 1 hour.
name: Choker-Arm Mutagen (Moderate)
